params.recipient: The address to receive the kToken

repayBorrowBehalf(address).details: all excess ETH will be returned to the sender

mint(address).notice: Deposit ETH into the Kawa protocol

repayBorrowBehalf(address).notice: repay borrow using raw ETH with the most up to date borrow balance

userdoc.notice: WETH router for depositing raw ETH into Kawa by wrapping into WETH then calling mint allows for a single transaction to remove ETH from Kawa
